name: PyDefence
description:
PyDefence is an A-Level computer science project written in python over 4-5 months of lesson time and at home. It is the first large python project I have ever completed and I have learnt a lot about game development from it. The game is available on tcupis.itch.io/pydefence and works on python3 (pillow required).

The source can be found on my GitHub: https://github.com/tcupis/PyDefence

I hope you enjoy the game in its current state, its not a polished masterpiece but that is not the point of the coursework. I hope you enjoy the game and would again love your feedback.

Bugs to be reported on the Github or here!

Tom
